articles.author: Adam Edelman, Bridget Bowman
articles.title: Arizona abortion ban fight jolts packed GOP House primary - NBC News
articles.description: The Arizona Supreme Court's decision to uphold an 1864 abortion ban and has jolted a crowded GOP congressional primary that includes the state House Speaker.
articles.content: On Tuesday night, Arizona state House Speaker Ben Toma found himself on defense, pushing back on criticism that he could have stopped the effort to repeal the states near-total abortion ban that dateâ€¦ [+8990 chars]
